settings.label: enable Image blur on page load?
Background image
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 1920 x 1080px

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.label: Cookie bar message
settings.default: We use cookies to improve our site and your shopping experience. By continuing to browse our site you accept our cookie policy.

settings.label: Enable gradiant color in theme
settings.info: If you enable gradiant color for theme, all theme button and background color will be in gradiant colors.

Cart Related Upsell Product Title
settings.default: Customers who bought this item also.

show Price

settings.label: Greeting Title
settings.default: Hi! Welcome to PixelStrap Themes :) How can we help you?

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

settings.label: Languages Support
settings.info: Use syntax : language_code=Language_text. Each language is separated by comma.

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting]({{ site.url }}/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.
